task.title: How to make friends in class
task.shortdesc: If you look good, smell good, and are feeling confident, now is the time to make friends in class.

step.cmd: Arrive at your class at least 15 minutes early.

info.note: If your classmates have headphones in, they probably don't want to be bothered.

step.cmd: Introduce yourself by shaking hands and making direct eye contact.
Find your classmate on Facebook, and add him/her as a friend.

taskbody.result: Congratulations! You have a new friend!
